title: Warhammers
content:
Warhammers in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Warhammers are Versatile Martial Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed or two-handed, dealing 1-8 Damage when one-handed and 1-10 damage when two-handed. They have a range of 1.5m, and they deal Bludgeoning Damage, though some special Warhammers also deal another type of Damage as well.

Many Warhammers have unique properties, so you should read carefully w
